      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long Coordinator.getDriverThreadId(Driver d)
      Accessor method to the the thread id number for a particular driver.
      static void Coordinator.receiveEvent(Driver d, Event e)
      Receives an event generated by a driver.
      static void Coordinator.registerEventWatch(Driver d, Event e)
      Adds the given driver to the watch list for events of type e.
      static void Coordinator.removeEventWatch(Driver d, Event e)
      Removes the given Driver from the watch list for Events of type e.
      static void Coordinator.scheduleSleep(Driver caller, long threadID)
      Schedules a Driver to sleep for a indefinite period.
      static void Coordinator.scheduleSleep(Driver caller, long wakeTime, long threadID)
      Schedules a Driver to re-create this driver at the given time.
      static boolean Coordinator.sendBinary(Driver caller, byte[] data)
      Sends binary data over the serial connection to a remote module.
      static boolean Coordinator.sendCommand(Driver caller, String command)
      Sends the given command to a specific remote module.
      static String Coordinator.sendCommandAndWait(Driver caller, String command, int waitPeriod)
      Sends a message to a remote module and waits waitPeriod seconds for a response.
      static void Coordinator.wakeSelf(Driver d)
      A convenience method to allow a driver to wake themselves.
